page.title: 03Day Centre
page.content: The Day Centre was purposely built for the care of elderly and handicapped people.It serves a very wide area.A special bus is used to convey them to and from the centre.The centre is open five days a week from 8:00am. until 5:00pm.The patients arrive at 9:00am. and depart at 3:30pm. Most of the people that use the centre live alone and they enjoy coming there for company.Trained staff are employed at the centre to look after the patients. Meals are cooked in modern kitchens at the centre and the menu is varied.A hair dresser is in attendance daily and the elderly are able to have their hair washed and set. The majority of the patients undertake some therapy either painting, woodwork or basket work. There is also a library in the building,but a large number of the patients use this room to rest.
